fields.name: id
fields.doc: Auto-incrementing Primary Key (UUID) of `sherlock_classifications` tables (mainly used for book-keeping proposes)

fields.name: classification
fields.doc: Top-ranked contextual classification for the transient (NULL, AGN, BS, CV, NT, ORPHAN, SN, UNCLEAR, VS)

fields.name: description
fields.doc: Long-form, human-readable summary of the transient's characteristics as infered from Sherlock's classification

fields.name: summary
fields.doc: Short-form summary of the transient's context usual for webpage quick-look summaries

fields.name: separation
fields.doc: Transient's angular separation (arcseconds) from the top-ranked catalogue source match

fields.name: z
fields.doc: Redshift of the top-ranked catalogue source match

fields.name: catalogue_object_type
fields.doc: Object type of the top-ranked catalogue source match
